articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of New Music Pieces Given by Moranbong Band
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Concert of New Music Pieces Given by Moranbong Band
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, together with Ri Sol Ju, enjoyed a concert of new music pieces given by the Moranbong Band at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Wednesday.
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yo Jong, Ri Jae Il and other senior party and army officials.
					
					 Also enjoying the performance were officials, creators and artistes in the field of art of the army and society, officials and writers of the Ministry of Culture, the C.C., the General Federation of the Unions of Literature and Art of Korea and the C.C., the Writers Union of Korea and teachers and researchers in the field of art education.
					
					 The concert began with female trio "The Dear Name Called by People."
					
					 Its repertoire included female solos and pangchang "Song of Big Fish Haul" and "Voice of My Heart", a series of light music "The Glorious Motherland" and "Ode to the Motherland" and female solo and pangchang "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 He congratulated the performers on their successful performance, waving back to the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience.
					
					 He said that the revolutionary and militant creative style of the Moranbong Band is characterized by the do-or-die spirit in which it carries out the task assigned by the party most successfully at the best level even by spending so many sleepless nights, the unique and forward looking creative zeal to ceaselessly create something new free from ready-made styles and formulas from an innovative point of view, and the collectivist hot wind of competition to conduct a campaign of ability, helping each other, adding that such a work style has been fully displayed through the concert.
					
					 He said the Moranbong Band not only created recently such new works as the song "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" but also made tireless efforts to improve their ability and skill, not resting content with its success already made and thus brought about big progress in the creation and representation of works.
					
					 Calling on the officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art to bring about innovations in their activities to create arts by learning from the creative style of the Moranbong Band, he gave them precious instructions to do so.
					
					 He underlined the need for the creators and artistes in the field of literature and art to hold high the slogan "Let's uphold the Songun leadership of the party by creating a lot of masterpieces!" and create more masterpieces fully representing the breath of the times.
					
					 He gave an instruction to channel efforts into creating folk songs from the firm viewpoint that the Korean-style melody and tune are the best and conduct a dynamic campaign for creating art works suited to the emotional feelings of the people including the Korean-style popular music.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that all officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and art including those of the Moranbong Band would turn out as one in the efforts to usher in a new heyday of the development of the Juche-oriented literature and art with strong confidence and courage and thus successfully discharge their honorable mission and duty for the era and the revolution.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Bangladesh
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation Thursday left here to take part in the 32nd meeting of health ministers of Southeastern Asian regional countries of WHO and its 67th General Assembly to be held in Dhaka, Bangladesh. It is headed by Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk.

articles.title: First Vice-Chairman of Russian Federation Council Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
First Vice-Chairman of Russian Federation Council Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Torshyn, first vice-chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, and his party visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday. 
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are preserved and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 Alexandr Torshyn wrote in the visitor's book that the great leaders of the Korean people made great contributions to developing the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.

articles.title: Participants in National Meeting of Educators Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in National Meeting of Educators Visit Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 13th National Meeting of Educators visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of the President's grandparents Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik and his parents Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok to pay silent tribute to them. 
					
					 They looked round historic relics at the President's old home, being briefed on the stories about his revolutionary life and family members. 
					
					 They visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to her and went round the cemetery. 
					
					 They also visited Kim Il Sung University. They went round several rooms of the Revolutionary Museum, E-Library, Swimming Pool. They went round the national educational experimental apparatuses and teaching aids exhibition and education aid exhibition. 
					
					 They visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, apartment houses of educators of Kim Il Sung University, Mirim Riding Club, Munsu Water Park and other places and enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarteners from across the country at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday in the run-up to the 66th birthday of the DPRK. 
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory Thursday in the run-up to the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The guests looked round the room dedicated to the history of the conservatory, the highest seat of learning Juche-oriented music, its auditoriums and concert hall and other places.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Pavel Reshakov, councilor of the Russian embassy, wrote in the visitor's book:
					
					 I have seen a large contingent of future able art talents. The successes made by the DPRK musicians are ascribable to the deep attention of the state and their energetic efforts, I think. I wish students of the conservatory good successes in international concours.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Hamhung, September 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Hungnam Port on Thursday in the run-up to the 66th birthday of the DPRK. 
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Panama-flagged ship Sea Star 7.
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 The speakers referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK and wisely led it and Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and glorified the DPRK as a dignified socialist power. 
					
					 The happiness and all valuable wealth of the Korean people are the precious results brought about  by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il all their lives, the speakers said, and went on:
					
					 Thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un the dignity and might of the DPRK have been put on the highest level startling the world. 
					
					 The speakers wished Kim Jong Un good health. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: National Flower Show Opens
articles.content:
National Flower Show Opens
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- A national flower show opened with due ceremony here on Thursday.
					 Ministries, national institutions and many other units of Pyongyang and provinces presented more than 20 000 potted flowers and flower shrubs of at least 1 400 species to the show.
					
					 The exhibits included miniature gardens decorated with flowers and flower shrubs and CDs on flower seeds and the art of making flower products.
					
					 The show also involves an experience-sharing meeting and presentation of scientific and technological knowledge to disseminate the technology for cultivating flowers and creating forestation.
					
					 The opening ceremony was held at the April 15 Children's Flower Garden.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Yong Gon, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kang Yong Su, minister of Urban Management, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, Kong Tok Chang, director of the Pyongyang Horticulture Guidance Bureau, officials and workers of flower cultivating units including the field of greening and flower lovers from across the country.
					
					 Kang Yong Su made an opening address.
					
					 The show will last till Sunday.

articles.title: Concert of New Music Pieces Given by Moranbong Band Highly Acclaimed
articles.content:
Concert of New Music Pieces Given by Moranbong Band Highly Acclaimed
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Moranbong Band gave an amazing performance with new famous songs and music pieces of Korean style.
					 The concert was given before full houses at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Wednesday and Thursday.
					
					 Watching it were officials, creators and artistes in the field of art of the army and society, journalists and editors, and teachers and researchers in the field of art education. 
					
					 The concert began with female trio "The Dear Name Called by People."
					
					 Its repertoire included female trio "Small White Boat Everybody Longed to See," female solo and pangchang "Voice of My Heart" and "Confession", a series of light music "The Glorious Motherland", "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic" and "Ode to the Motherland".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the great mother party and impressively portrayed the drive to create a high level of civilization under the care of the sun.
					
					 Also put on the stage were female solos and pangchang "Song of Big Fish Haul" and "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass", female chorus "Song of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School", female solo "Fifteen Minutes on That Day" and other pieces.
					
					 The concert was highly acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: DPRK: Home-made Hosiery in High Demand
articles.content:
DPRK: Home-made Hosiery in High Demand
Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Various shapes of home-made hosiery have gained popularity among citizens in the DPRK.
					 The hosiery, produced at the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, includes socks, stockings and pantyhose.
					
					 In particular women's winter socks and men's summer mesh socks are very popular among the local people.
					
					 The socks, embroidered with pictures from cartoon, have a great vogue among children.
					
					 Besides, the demand for new kinds of sports socks is growing.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Suppression of Jongyojo
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Suppression of Jongyojo
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Tuesday posted an editorial titled "Can conscience of teachers be subject to punishment?" in denunciation of the authorities' suppression of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo). 
					 Education at school is very poor owing to the unpopular education policy of the "government", the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 The "government's" suppression of Jongyojo has gone beyond the tolerance limit, in particular. 
					
					 Teachers made public a declaration on the situation to prevent the recurrence of the ferry Sewol disaster and as they could not remain an onlooker to the moves of the present "government" and the "Saenuri Party" to evade the responsibility for it. Can it be subject to investigation by the prosecution?
					
					 What the teachers wanted over the ferry Sewol disaster was a responsible act prompted by their compunction that they can not hand over such an instable society to children and by their conscience as educators.
					
					 Now the people hope for improving the dark reality of education and giving right education to children, and support Jongyojo. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the present "government" does not stop indiscriminate suppression of Jongyojo.

articles.title: South Korean Religionists Demand Institution of Special Law
articles.content:
South Korean Religionists Demand Institution of Special Law
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Clerics of five orders of south Korea on Sept. 1 held a joint prayer meeting in demand of the institution of a special law in Seoul, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The Religious Believers Council of five orders for instituting a special law for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster consists of the clerics of Catholic, Kaesin, Buddhism, Ronal Buddhism and Chondoism.
					
					 The members and religionists of the council gathered before the Posin Pavilion and strongly demanded the probe into the ferry Sewol disaster and the institution of a special law.
					
					 They marched to the Kwanghwamun plaza and held a prayer meeting there.
					
					 They mourned over the death of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 They insisted on the institution of a special law comprising the right to investigate and prosecute those responsible for the disaster as demanded by the bereaved families.
					
					 Religionists of south Korea are joining the public in their action against the puppet authorities turning their face away from the institution of a special law.

articles.title: Damage by Insects on Increase in S. Korea
articles.content:
Damage by Insects on Increase in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Haenam, South Jolla Province of south Korea is being damaged by insects, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 Hundreds of millions of insects swarmed to farmland there since August 27, damaging crops including rice.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Turning down Demand for Institution of Special Law
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Turning down Demand for Institution of Special Law 
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Bereaved families of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and representatives of labor, academic and religious circles of south Korea staged an action rapping the puppet group for turning down the demand for the institution of a special law on the ferry Sewol disaster at Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on Sept. 2, according to Voice of People, a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 They held a press conference at which they demanded the chief executive make a decision to institute a special law granting the fact-finding committee with the right to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster.
					
					 They started the action of making a bow after every three steps to thrust 1.35 million papers signed by people in demand of the institution of the special law to Chongwadae.
					
					 The police blocked them, charging them with "illegal demonstration".
					
					 They declared that they would not stop the action until the papers are handed over to Chongwadae.
					
					 They called on the "president" to apologize on her knees, not missing the last chance.
					
					 They had been on the protest action for more than four hours at the plaza.
					
					 The protesters declared the people who signed the papers would never pardon Chongwadae.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated by Beninese Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated by Beninese Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, made public a statement on August 29 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is regarding independence as the life of the country and nation.
					
					 In its external activities it is developing friendly relations with all countries of the world respecting its sovereignty and advancing toward a new independent world freed from aggression, intervention, domination  over other countries and subjugation.
					
					 The DPRK is a country with invincible military muscle.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has been firmly prepared politically, ideologically and in military technique and the all-people, all-state defence system with it as a core has been firmly established.
					
					 What is noteworthy in particular is the fact that the DPRK set forth the strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force to cope with the ceaseless challenges and escalating nuclear threat of the U.S. and is thoroughly applying it.
					
					 The DPRK is directing big efforts to building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 I and the Socialist Party of Benin are convinced that the DPRK would invariably take the road of independence, Songun and socialism pioneered and led by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as it is holding respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as a distinguished leader in high esteem.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated by Guinean Organization
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated by Guinean Organization
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin on August 26 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin carried articles including the one titled "DPRK Today".
					
					 The article titled "Invincible socialist power" said:
					
					 The Democratic People's Republic of Korea was founded on September 9, 1948, 66 years ago.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK, built it into a rich and powerful socialist state.
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, the successor to the cause of the President, consolidated the DPRK into a socialist fortress.
					
					 The bulletin introduced the invincibility of the DPRK, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He is leading the drive for building an economic power based on the latest science and technology, consolidating the position of the DPRK as a political and military power.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the DPRK's capability for self-defence has been bolstered up and its army and people are making a history of new victory in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK will remain shining forever as an invincible socialist power.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked by UK Organizations
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked by UK Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 28 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK was founded on September 9, 1948, a historic event which heralded the birth of Juche Korea in the world.
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK in reflection of the will of all Korean people in the north and the south.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the Korean people brilliantly settled the power problem, the basic problem in the revolutionary struggle, successfully carried out the anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution and transition to the socialist revolution in a brief period and built the socialist state centered on the popular masses, free from exploitation and oppression.
					
					 The DPRK has developed the self-supporting national economy despite the economic sanctions and blockade of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					
					 Today socialist Korea is dynamically advancing toward the building of a thriving nation and the reunification of the country while creating the new Korean speed under the Songun revolutionary leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Racial Discrimination Policy Denounced by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Racial Discrimination Policy Denounced by Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism released a statement on August 27 denouncing the U.S. for its racial discrimination policy.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Shortly ago, a young black man was shot dead by a white policeman in Ferguson City, Missouri State, U.S. and a policeman shot another black young man to death in another city. Such bloody cases prove that the freedom of the black in the U.S., a country advocating "democracy" and "freedom", is the freedom of death forced by the white.
					
					 In the miserable fate of the black Americans who are subject to death by the white for being black, the world is once again awakened to the poor human rights performance in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal of human rights abuses who should sit in the dock at an international human rights tribunal.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once styling itself a "human rights judge" and settle its serious human rights issue, to begin with, far from taking issue with other countries over their "human rights performances".

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries from August 27 to 29 to mark the 66th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They included lectures and film shows in Benin, Guinea and Indonesia.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun" and "Pyongyang Today".
					
					 The rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin who is chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a lecture:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the founder of the DPRK.
					
					 He had a far-reaching plan to build a people's country in his early years and carved out a new road of building the people's power defending and carrying out the interests of working people from the independent stand, not wedded to ready-made theories or experience of other countries.
					
					 He founded the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East, on September 9, 1948.
					
					 I pay the highest tribute to the President on the occasion of 66th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea and the dean of the Art Faculty of the Guinean Art College praised the President and leader Kim Jong Il for founding and developing the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is shedding its rays all over the world thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, they said, adding that the DPRK will remain shining forever as an invincible socialist power.

articles.title: Day of Songun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Songun Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, September 4 (KCNA) -- There took place events in foreign countries between August 20 and 26 to mark the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 They included lectures and film shows in Uganda and Guinea and a film show in Nigeria.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Pyongyang at Night", "Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks", "Arms of Korea" and "Reply of Korea".
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said the exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed by laying an eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and the nation by dint of Songun will shine forever along with the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association of Guinea said Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, an event of weighty significance.
					
					 He added:
					
					 When socialism was frustrated in various countries at the end of the last century, the KPA resolutely foiled the anti-socialist offensive of the imperialist allied forces as a staunch and reliable defender of the socialist cause.
					
					 The DPRK is invincible thanks to its single-minded unity, remains strong thanks to self-reliance in defence and is prospering through the industrial revolution in the new century. This eye-opening reality would be unthinkable without the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de nuevas piezas de la Banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia concierto de nuevas piezas de la Banda Moranbong
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio el dia 3 junto con Ri Sol Ju el concierto de nuevas piezas musicales de la Banda Moranbong que tuvo lugar en el capitalino Teatro de Arte Mansudae.
					  Entre los espectadores se distinguian los cuadros del partido y el ejercito como Hwang Pyong So, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yo Jong y Ri Jae Il.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes igualmente los funcionarios, creadores y artistas del sector artistico militar y civil, los funcionarios y escritores del Ministerio de Cultura, el Comite Central de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea y el CC de la Union de Escritores de Corea, los profesores e investigadores de la rama de educacion artistica.
					
					  El concierto quedo iniciado con el trio femenino "El nombre carinoso que llama el pueblo" y estuvo programado con el solo femenino y pangchang (coro del foso) "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar" y "Voz de mi corazon", las musicas ligeras en serie "Patria radiante" e "Himno a la patria", el solo femenino y pangchang "Confesion" y "El mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol", etc.
					
					  Kim Jong Un respondio agitando su mano a las efusivas aclamaciones de ejecutantes y espectadores felicitandoles por el exitoso concierto.
					
					  La Banda Moranbong cumple perfectamente velando muchas noches las tareas asignadas por el partido, crea sin parar nuevas piezas con la vision innovadora apartandose del estilo y esquema existentes y libra la competencia de talentos ayudando mutuamente, dijo y continuo que eso es el revolucionario y combativo modo de creacion de ella que se ha comprobado en esta ocasion.
					
					  Esta banda, que creo recientemente "El mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol" y otras canciones nuevas, se esfuerza con teson por mejorar su capacidad y talentos musicales sin complacerse de los exitos anteriores, apunto y agrego que asi se ha logrado un gran avance en la creacion e interpretacion de las piezas musicales.
					
					  Dio valiosas instrucciones destacando que los funcionarios, creadores y artistas de la rama literaria y artistica deben registrar innovaciones en la creacion de obras artisticas al aprender el modo de creacion de la Banda Moranbong.
					
					  Enfatizo que ellos deben crear muchas obras maestras, que hagan sentir los alientos de la epoca, trabajando bajo la consigna de "!Produzcamos muchas obras maestras en acato a la direccion del Songun del partido!"
					
					  Desde el punto de vista de que son mejores nuestras melodias y ritmos, hay que esforzarse mucho por crear canciones folcloricas y trabajar intensamente por hacer las musicas populares al estilo coreano y otras obras que convengan a los sentimientos del pueblo, indico.
					
					  Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que todos los funcionarios, creadores y artistas de la Banda Moranbong y del sector literario y artistico cumpliran con su honrosa mision y deber al abrir nuevo periodo de esplendor de la literatura y arte del tipo Juche movilizandose unanimemente con la fe y coraje redoblados.

articles.title: Tiene lugar II Conferencia de la Union de Arquitectos de Corea
articles.content:
Tiene lugar II Conferencia de la Union de Arquitectos de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en la Casa Central de la Juventud la II Conferencia de la Union de Arquitectos de Corea. 
					Participaron ahi el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong, el vicepremier Choe Yong Gon, y otros funcionarios correspondientes, asi como los delegados seleccionados en las conferencias provinciales de la UAC. 
					
					El foro decidio discutir las tres agendas: "Balance de trabajo del CC de la UAC", "Enmienda del estatuto de la UAC" y "Eleccion del organo de direccion del CC de la UAC". 
					
					El vicepresidente del CC de la UAC, Sim Yong Hak, presento el informe sobre la primera agenda. 
					
					El orador recordo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il presto profunda atencion al desarrollo de la UAC concediendo suma importancia al papel de esta organizacion en la construccion de un Estado prospero. 
					
					En los anales del ultimo decenio recorridos por la UAC estan registradas las huellas de sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, otro maestro de arquitectura y genio de la creacion y construccion, dijo y continuo: 
					
					El Mariscal averiguo en varias ocasiones las labores de la UAC e ilumino claramente los asuntos para que la UAC cumpla su responsabilidad y papel como organizacion social de arquitectos y tecnicos de construccion. 
					
					Se han mejorado constantemente las labores de la UAC y elevado el papel de los miembros de la UAC. De esta manera, la UAC ha hecho gran aporte a realizar el gran proposito del partido sobre la construccion de un pais civilizado socialista. 
					
					Todos los exitos se deben a la sabia direccion del Dirigente y del Mariscal. 
					
					Todos los funcionarios y miembros de la UAC deben registrar nuevos saltos e innovaciones en la creacion de autoctonos edificios arquitectonicos, en acato a la idea y direccion del Mariscal, y contribuir a adelantar la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Luego, intervinieron el jefe de departamento del CC de la UAC, Pang Se Yong, el secretario general del Comite de la UAC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Ri Ki Chol, el subdirector de la Direccion Estatal de Disenos, Jong Hui Chol, el rector del Instituto Superior de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental de la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang, Paek Nam Hyok, etc. 
					
					Fue aprobada la resolucion de la primera agenda. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo discursos sobre la segunda y tercera agendas. 
					
					El conclave aprobo el estatuto enmendado de la UAC y eligio nuevo organo de direccion del CC de la UAC.

articles.title: Se conmemora 40o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il "Acerca del arte operistico"
articles.content:
Se conmemora 40o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il "Acerca del arte operistico"
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang el acto conmemorativo del 40o aniversario de publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Acerca del arte operistico" con la participacion del ministro de Cultura Pak Chun Nam, los funcionarios, creadores, artistas, profesores e investigadores de la rama de arte y de educacion artistica. 
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Escritores y Artistas de Corea, An Tong Chun. 
					
					El orador dijo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il publico en septiembre del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche la obra maestra "Acerca del arte operistico" sistematizando globalmente la idea y teoria en materia de la construccion de arte operistico de tipo jucheano. 
					
					El Dirigente presento el establecimiento del Juche en el arte operistico como principio fundamental a ser mantenido en la revolucion operistica y dilucido claramente los principios de elevar el espiritu partidista, obrero y popular en la creacion de operas, de combinar bien el caracter ideologico con el artistico y de mantener la velocidad y el colectivismo.
					
					La obra aclara la superioridad de la cancion en estrofas, las caracteristicas y papel de pangchang, las peculiaridades y descripcion de orquesta operistica  y otros asuntos teorico- practicos que se presentan en la creacion y descripcion de musicas operisticas. 
					
					Hoy en dia, a la rama de arte operistico incumbe el importante deber de materializar cabalmente las tareas indicadas en el mensaje enviado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un a los participantes en la IX Conferencia Nacional de Artistas, destaco el orador y llamo a todos los creadores y artistas a levantarse como un solo hombre para abrir la nueva era de prosperidad de literatura y arte en acato al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un avivando las llamas de creacion de la velocidad de Corea.

articles.title: Alexandr Torshyn y su comitiva visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Alexandr Torshyn y su comitiva visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El primer vicepresidente del Consejo de Federacion de Rusia, Alexandr Torshyn, y su comitiva visitaron el dia 4 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Los visitantes rusos rindieron homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los halles de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Y pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes, los carros, el coche electrico, el barco y los vagones de tren usados por los Generalisimos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas para realizar visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.
					
					Alexandr Torshyn firmo el libro de visitas como siguen:
					
					Los grandes Lideres del pueblo coreano hicieron gran aporte al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre Rusia y Corea.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion nacional de flores
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion nacional de flores
Pyongyang, 4 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada hoy en el Jardin de Flores de Ninos 15 de Abril la exposicion nacional de flores.
					Los ministerios, organos centrales y numerosas unidades de la capital y todas las provincias presentaron mas de 20 mil flores de mas de mil 400 variedades de flores y arbustos floriferos.
					
					Los participantes exhibieron los especiales articulos adornados con flores y arbustos floriferos, las semillas de varias flores y CD que muestra las tecnicas de fabricacion de productos floriferos.
					
					Durante el periodo de exposicion tendran lugar el seminario de experiencias y la presentacion de ciencia y tecnica para divulgar la tecnologia de cultivo de flores y la creacion de arboledas.
					
					En el acto participaron el vicepremier Choe Yong Gon, el ministro de Urbanismo Kang Yong Su, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang Cha Hui Rim, el director de Jardineria de Pyongyang Kong Tok Chang, funcionarios y trabajadores de las unidades de produccion de flores de todo el pais incluyendo el sector de arboleda y aficionados a flores.
					
					  La palabra de inauguracion estuvo a cargo de Kang Yong Su.
					
					La exposicion continua hasta el dia 7.
